name: Aspirin
description: Aspirin is a commonly used pain reliever and anti-inflammatory medication.

ingredients.name: Acetylsalicylic Acid
ingredients.description: Acetylsalicylic acid is the active ingredient in aspirin.
ingredients.overdoseEffect: Overdose of acetylsalicylic acid can cause gastrointestinal bleeding and other serious complications.
ingredients.sideEffect: Common side effects of aspirin include stomach upset and heartburn.

name: Paracetamol
description: Paracetamol, also known as acetaminophen, is a commonly used pain reliever and fever reducer.

ingredients.name: Paracetamol
ingredients.description: Paracetamol is the active ingredient in this medication.
ingredients.overdoseEffect: Overdose of paracetamol can lead to liver damage or failure.
ingredients.sideEffect: Side effects of paracetamol are rare but may include liver toxicity at high doses.

name: Ibuprofen
description: Ibuprofen is a nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) commonly used for pain relief and reducing inflammation.

ingredients.name: Ibuprofen
ingredients.description: Ibuprofen is the active ingredient in this medication.
ingredients.overdoseEffect: Overdose of ibuprofen can cause stomach bleeding, kidney damage, and other serious complications.
ingredients.sideEffect: Common side effects of ibuprofen include stomach upset, heartburn, and dizziness.

name: Cough Syrup
description: Cough syrup is used to relieve cough symptoms associated with colds and respiratory infections.

ingredients.name: Dextromethorphan
ingredients.overdoseEffect: Overdose of dextromethorphan can cause dizziness, drowsiness, and nausea.
ingredients.sideEffect: Common side effects of dextromethorphan include drowsiness and dizziness.

ingredients.name: Guaifenesin
ingredients.description: Guaifenesin is an expectorant that helps loosen mucus and phlegm.
ingredients.overdoseEffect: Overdose of guaifenesin is unlikely, but large doses may cause nausea and vomiting.
ingredients.sideEffect: Common side effects of guaifenesin include nausea and vomiting.
